thread.title: New Emojis Come To iPhone With iOS 9.1 Release
thread.title_full: New Emojis Come To iPhone With iOS 9.1 Release

author: Lorenzo Ligato
title: New Emojis Come To iPhone With iOS 9.1 Release
text:
New Emojis Come To iPhone With iOS 9.1 Release All hail the taco emoji! Lorenzo Ligato Editorial Fellow, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/21/2015 05:04 PM EDT | Edited: 1 minute ago 
The wait is over. Starting today, iPhone users will finally have emojis for tacos, unicorns and much more. 
Apple on Wednesday released iOS 9.1, a small update for its mobile software, bringing with it 150 highly anticipated emojis. 
Here are some of them: Emojipedia 
We got a glimpse at a bunch of the new emojis last month , when a beta version of iOS 9.1 became available to developers. 
Among other improvements, the update also optimizes Live Photos, Apple's new animated image feature . Your iPhone can now sense when you raise or lower the device, so you won't record any accidental movements. 
To download the latest version of iOS, head to Settings > General > Software Update > Download and Install iOS 9.1. Agree to Apple's Terms and Conditions, and you're all set: Your download will start immediately, and you'll soon be able to send that taco emoji to anyone you fancy. ðŸ™‹
